summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Planeat
Review Date: 2012/12/18
Store: T. Colin Campbell  (Actor),     Caldwell Esselstyn Jr.  (Actor),     Shelley Lee Davies  (Director),     Or Shlomi  (Director)    &                   1                  more   Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Independently Distributed, Documentary
Product Description: ["Where have we gone wrong? Why has the death rate from heart disease and cancer exploded in recent times? Why are the ice caps melting, the oceans dying and the forests being cut down as we produce the food necessary to support our burgeoning populations? Against a backdrop of colorful and delicious food grown by organic farmers and prepared in the kitchens of world-famous chefs, PLANEAT for the first time brings together the ground-breaking studies of three prominent scientists who have made it their life's work to answer these questions."]
Average Rating: 4.5
Product Details: {'Aspect Ratio': '1.78:1', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 2.72 Ounces', 'Director': 'Shelley Lee Davies, Or Shlomi', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, NTSC, Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Run time': '1 hour and 11 minutes', 'Release date': 'July 3, 2012', 'Actors': 'T. Colin Campbell, Caldwell Esselstyn Jr.', 'Subtitles': 'English, Spanish, German, Chinese', 'Studio': 'True Mind', 'Number of discs': '1'}
Review Text: The interviews are very good, provide such great informative information and everyone should listen to what is being said and learn from it.
Review Title: Great interviews
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Review Date: 2014/02/15
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Jamie Payne', 'Harry Bradbeer', 'Coky Giedroyc', 'Sandra Goldbacher', 'Catherine Morshead'], 'Producers': ['Kudos Film and Production'], 'Starring': ['Dominic West', 'Romola Garai', 'Ben Whishaw'], 'Studio': ['BBC America']}
Review Text: This program was a great and very interesting program. I was disappointed that the series was so short as I was just getting into and enjoying the program.
Review Title: Give me more series
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Review Date: 2014/02/15
Average Rating: 4.6
Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Jamie Payne', 'Sandra Goldbacher', 'Catherine Morshead'], 'Producers': ['Abi Morgan', 'Jane Featherstone', 'Derek Wax', 'Lucy Richer'], 'Starring': ['Dominic West', 'Romola Garai', 'Ben Whishaw'], 'Studio': ['BBC America']}
Review Text: As I wrote before this was a fascination program with an interesting staff and interactions taking the audience on an emotional merry go round. more please!
Review Title: Why only 2 episodes
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Review Date: 2014/03/04
Average Rating: 4.6

Focus only on keywords and clear trends supported by multiple interactions. Do not repeat specific product names or details. avoid repeating product names, specifications, or technical details:

        1. POSITIVE: Describe only the positive experiences and what was liked.

        2. NEGATIVE: Describe only the negative experiences and what was disliked.

        3. OVERALL: Provide a overall summary including both positive and negative aspects.

raw_response:
POSITIVE SUMMARY:
The user has expressed a strong appreciation for various programs, particularly documentaries and historical series. They frequently highlight engaging interviews and informative content that provides valuable insights. Consistently, purchase decisions reflect a desire for intriguing storylines and captivating performances. Viewers enjoyed emotional dynamics and outstanding production quality, describing several shows as excellent entertainment and worth watching. The user also appreciates the insightful portrayal of historical contexts and cultural aspects, noting that certain series truly bring past events to life. Their commendation for series length suggests a strong connection to and enjoyment of the narratives being presented.

NEGATIVE SUMMARY:
Despite numerous positive experiences, the user has encountered some dissatisfaction, particularly related to short series lengths, which left them longing for more content. They voiced disappointment with specific titles, pointing to poor storylines that did not meet their expectations. This indicates a gap between user anticipation and the eventual delivery of content. Some critiques reveal a desire for better-developed narratives, suggesting that not all products resonated positively, creating a mixed experience overall.

OVERALL SUMMARY:
The user's purchase history reveals a strong affinity for engaging and informative programming, consistently expressing satisfaction with the richness and depth of content across various series. Positive sentiments dominate, focusing on excellent storytelling, informative dialogue, and immersive experiences. However, some frustrations concerning brief series and subpar storylines indicate room for improvement. This combination of positive engagement and occasional dissatisfaction illustrates a discerning viewer who values quality programming yet seeks consistent execution across all purchases.

target_interaction.title: Interesting police stories
target_interaction.text: An interesting story about 3 generations of a family of police officers that provides both family life and excitement of solving crimes in the local community
